api.name: ObInputClearDirective
api.usage: This directive is to be put on a button and will clear the configured input field.

inputs.name: obInputClear
inputs.text: Reference to the HTML input element, the NgModel or the FormControl to be cleared.

inputs.name: focusOnClear
inputs.text: Defines if the referenced input element should be focused after content has been cleared.

inputs.name: datePickerRef
inputs.text: Reference to `matDatepicker` (necessary when working with a Datepicker).

outputs.name: onClear
outputs.text: Emits when the input's content has been cleared
